text:
Outbound (YC W15) - https://outbound.io

San Francisco, CA | on-site only | relocation possible.

We are hiring multiple positions including engineering, design, marketing and sales. See all positions at https://jobs.lever.co/outbound.

We're still a very small team of just 4 (1 full-time engineer). You'll be in at the ground floor during an exciting period of growth.

Email Travis at travis[at]outbound[dot].io if interested or use the job listing to apply.
